MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v3 - B6: Behavioral Assessment â€” Geriatric Depression Scale

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

SATIS.Description: 1. Are you basically statisfied with your life?

DROPACT.Description: 2. Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?

EMPTY.Description: 3. Do you feel that your life is empty?

SPIRITS.Description: 5. Are you in good spirits most of the time?

AFRAID.Description: 6. Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you?

HAPPY.Description: 7. Do you feel happy most of the time?

STAYHOME.Description: 9. Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

MEMPROB.Description: 10. Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most?

WONDRFUL.Description: 11. Do you think it is wonderful to be alive now?

WRTHLESS.Description: 12. Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?

ENERGY.Description: 13. Do you feel full of energy?

HOPELESS.Description: 14. Do you feel that your situation is hopeless?

BETTER.Description: 15. Do you think that most people are better off than you are?
